name: acquaintanceship
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a relationship between two people who have met but do not know each other well: Ours was a strictly professional acquaintanceship. He proposed to his wife after only three days of acquaintanceship. See
acquaintance
More examplesFewer examplesShe struck up an acquaintanceship with the owner of the convenience store.It would be unfair to draw conclusions about her on such brief acquaintanceship. It was the second time in their acquaintanceship that he had insulted her.
